Room.Name: Allisk Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually walking along the eastern rim of the Allisk Circle.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the mysterious Allisk Manor on the northeast side of the circle, surrounded by metal bars. The Manor is believed to still be haunted by the ghosts of previous owners and even the notorious Countess Natasha de Allisk herself. Luckily, she hasn't been seen outside of her mansion so perhaps she has gone into hibernation. Hillcrest Drive continues off to the east.
